feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [BHS7][Dedicated Servers] - Rooms B702/B703/B707/B709 maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 10, 10:00 - 20:00 UTC

Jan 13, 21:42 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our electrical infrastructure.

Start time : 10/03/2026 10:00 UTC
End time : 10/03/2026 20:00 UTC
Service impact : Some servers located in rooms B702, B703, B707 and B709 might be temporarily unavailable from 10:30 UTC during the maintenance .
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our electrical infrastructure.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [BHS8][Dedicated Servers] - Racks BHS0804B03A Incident Notification
entry.content:
Feb 11, 22:21 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Dedicated Servers on rack BHS0804B03A has been resolved.

Start time : 11/02/2026 20:26 UTC
End time : 11/02/2026 22:15 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a cooling system issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Feb 11, 20:32 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our Dedicated offer on the specific BHS0804B03A.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 11/02/2026 20:26 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some servers in the racks BHS0804B03A are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Some the customers cannot access their servers in these specific racks.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a cooling system issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
